name: my fragile ball
description:
What the fuck is this shit?

This is a game that is made in 2 days (and a lot of procrastination) or so.

Made for this jam. Cool stuff.

What to expect:

My first try on Godot's 3D. It be nice tho

Bad modelling lol.

A working leaderboard, kinda? (note: it doesn't work on the web build becuz the leaderboard website I am using doesn't have SSL.)

SIMULATION MOOOOOOOOOooOOOOOooooOOOooOOde

A difficult game.

Aaaannnnnd BAAALLLLLLLLSSSSS!!!!!

Controls:

Your mouse (or trackpad)

Left click to drag a ball

Right click to activate shield. That's it, simple stuff.

Credits:

Thank you so much to this wonderful person for hosting the jam!

The bad music? - I made it

The modelling? - I made it

The one typing this description - Me!

Note from the dev(il):

I recommend playing the executable build rather than the web.

Reason 1: No leaderboard

Reason 2: No leaderboard

Reason 3: Reason 2

Reason  4: Laggy aaaand bugs
